content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're talking about the price. What is your offer? Remember, I'm looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my intent as a student in need of an affordable place to stay strongly opposes overpaying.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo Wang. I appreciate your honesty. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
